thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text:
My son and I spent a week there at the end of February, 2017. Roberto and his family were excellent hosts. They had answers to all of our questions and quickly resolved any issues that we had. I couldn't have been more impressed.
The casa itself is quite comfortable and clean. We enjoyed a freshly prepared breakfast fast each morning at a great price. They were also quick to ask about any dietary restrictions.
The bedrooms are spacious and nicely decorated in a contemporary Cuban style. The dining area and the common area are really nice to be in.
Finally, I have to mention that Roberto and his family are warm and gracious hosts who kindly endured my broken Spanish.
Oh! I should add that the air conditioners work well and there is lots of hot water for showers.
